title: NVS Non Teaching Various Post, Download Result 2025
postname: NVS Non Teaching Various Post Recruitment
description: The Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti has released the NVS Non Teaching Various Post Result Key 2025 on July 15, 2025, declaring the shortlist of 1377 candidates who appeared in the Computer‑Based Test held from May 14 to 19, 2025, and qualified for the next stages including interview, skill test, trade test or document verification in roles like Legal Assistant, Stenographer, Electrician‑cum‑Plumber, Assistant Section Officer, Audit Assistant, Staff Nurse, Mess Helper, Lab Attendant and Junior Secretariat Assistant; candidates can now check the result PDF by entering their roll number and date of birth on the official NVS portal and those shortlisted have been selected in a 1:5 ratio against vacancy for specific posts while those excluded can use the answer key released on June 10 with the option to raise objections by June 14; the NVS Non Teaching Result 2025 PDF, NVS various post merit list, NVS Non Teaching shortlisted candidates, NVS answer key 2025, NVS objection window, Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti result 2025, NVS skill test call letters, NVS document verification list, NVS non teaching CBT result, and NVS recruitment drive 2024–25 are among the top search terms for this update and aspirants are encouraged to download the result PDF immediately, verify their inclusion, prepare for their respective next stage assessments, and stay tuned for schedule announcements related to interviews, skill or trade tests or document verification to advance their candidature.

title: nvsnonteaching2 / Havaldar Recruitment 2025
description: The SSC MTS 2025 Recruitment, conducted by the Staff Selection Commission (SSC), offers opportunities for 10th-pass candidates to join as Multi-Tasking Staff (MTS) in various government departments and as Havaldar in CBIC and CBN. The notification was released on June 26, 2025, announcing 1,075 Havaldar vacancies, with MTS vacancies to be updated later. Candidates aged 18–25 (MTS/CBN) or 18–27 (CBIC/some MTS posts) can apply from June 26 to July 24, 2025 via ssc.gov.in. The Computer-Based Test (CBT) is scheduled from September 20 to October 24, 2025. The selection process includes CBT (Session 1 & 2), PET/PST (for Havaldar), and Document Verification. The pay scale is ₹18,000–₹22,000 (Level 1, 7th Pay Commission), making it an attractive Sarkari Naukri option. Stay updated at ssc.gov.in for results and further announcements.[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam)[](https://www.careerpower.in/ssc-mts.html)[](https://www.shiksha.com/exams/ssc-mts-exam-notification)
